summary: Bitcoin mining stocks were mostly down on Friday, November 18.
title: Bitcoin mining stock report: Friday, November 18
content: Bitcoin mining stocks tracked by The Block were mostly down on Friday, November 18.
The price of Bitcoin was about $16,612 at the time of market close.
The stocks down the most were TeraWulf (14.23%) and Greenidge Generation (11.87%). SAI Tech was up 17.95%.
